item.title: Migrate Posterous without losing the images
item.description: It might seem very obvious to you that if you migrate from Posterous blogs to another service your images should be transitioned as well. If you want a free service (as Posterous was) there are only two options where you can migrate your Posterous to without writing all your posts one by one again: 1) Wordpress.com (but losing all the images) 2) Obolog.com (and keeping all the images) So, if you want your blog back including images the only option you have is Obolog.
